page.title: 09 Mrs. Mary Marriott
page.content: When I was talking to Mrs. Marriott she said it was lovely to live on a farm, and that she had not lived on any other farm before she was married. She told us that they had 14 fields and they were growing winter barley, wheat, oats and beans. She said they had got 48 sheep and 94 lambs this year but they used to have pigs, cows and goats. They also have two dogs one called Pudding and the other Custard. The time Mrs. Marriott gets up is 7.00 a.m. and sometimes earlier. She is a member of the W.I. and enjoys taking part in the village pantomime group both as an actress and helping with back stage. Mrs. Marriott is one of the School Governors.
